item.description:
Hey everyone,
If you'd like to spend some time LOLing, please join me this Saturday evening at ImprovAsylum.

ImprovAsylum is, apparently, one of the better comedy clubs in Boston. The show we'll be going to (called the 'Main Stage Show') is an interactive sketch improvisation that runs like a mix of Whose line is it anyway and SNL. Supposedly very good.

Tickets are $20 each. Please buy your tickets online (http://improvasylum.c...) for the 8pm Main Stage Show on Saturday Dec 6. We meet at 7:30pm.

How to get there: The place is in the North End. Parking is a hassle. Still, if you're going to drive, you may want to check out http://bestparking.co... for parking garages in the vicinity. Alternatively, you can take the Green or Orange lines to Haymarket, walk to Cross St, turn right, walk a block (SE) and turn left on Hanover St.

Hope to see you all there!
item.name: ImprovAsylum
